= Doxygen=

[http://www.stack.nl/~dimitri/doxygen/index.html Doxygen] is a documentation generator for C++, C, Java, Objective-C, Python, IDL (versiones Corba y Microsoft), PHP, C#, and D. It is valid for Unix, Windows and Mac OS X. 
Doxygen is the acronym of dox(document) gen(generator), source code documentation generator.
